snippet: A lawsuit filed in California against Hyundai claims that advertising for the 2011-12 Elantra trumpeted its 40 miles-per-gallon rating without sufficiently disclosing that this is just one of the car’s economy ratings.
abstract: Lawsuit filed in California against Hyundai claims that advertising for the 2011-2012 Elantra boasts a 40 miles-per-gallon rating without sufficiently disclosing that this is just one of the car’s economy ratings.
lead_paragraph: A lawsuit filed in California against Hyundai claims that advertising for the 2011-12 Elantra trumpeted its 40 miles-per-gallon rating without sufficiently disclosing that this is just one of the car’s economy ratings.

headline.main: Hyundai Is Sued Over Elantra Mileage
